creator: App_Evolution
descriptionHtml:
Overview of the Holy Prayer Application


📓 Al-Quran Al-Kareem is designed to ensure that every Muslim can read the Quran as an important source of guidance in his earthly life. The app gives the necessary information to help Muslims reveal their faith and cultural traditions. There's no need to worry about how to address your religious needs if you have the Prophet Muhammad's teachings in your gadget. Live your life in this world according to the Quran!
📓 This Android app resembles the Holy book due to its design and content. Thanks to the adoption of some useful features, it is possible to utilize this tool both for reading and mp3 listening. Consider the pro argument for possessing this application: you can leave the printed Quran at home and use this app whenever and wherever you are. Just hold your device… and discover the significance of number 99 the names of Allah! Each of these names is related to a certain outstanding attribute of Allah. For example, one of them is Al-Majeed, which means “the glorious”.
📓 You have a chance to memorize all 40 Hadiths of the Prophet and preserve religious identity supported by Islamic studies. It's not difficult to follow the Five Pillars of Islam if you have your device within easy reach. These are the fundamental norms of your religious practice! Be the one among millions of Muslims to accept these norms!
📓 Pray + Ramadan Reminder is important for taking part in extra prayers. Spend the required amount of time reading the Holy Quran texts! Download this and forget about your time management problems! You'll never miss your prayer time if you have this amazing app. Also, there's an inserted Qibla direction compass that informs a Muslim what direction he should face while engaged in praying. It's critical to face Mecca wherever you are.
📓 Thanks to the option that allows the user to find the nearest Halal shops, it is possible to save your time on online or offline search for the necessary Islamic food products, cosmetics, hygiene and pharmaceutical goods, and different services. The inserted Islamic Calendar guarantees accuracy in planning your personal activities related to your religious practice. Stay motivated with this useful app!

How to Use the Android App


🙏The Quran application is easy to use. You can utilize the following guide:🙏
📿 Take your device to start the app's loading
📿 Access your app
📿 Select the teaching you're going to read or listen to
📿 Choose the most appropriate language option
📿 Initiate your reading or listening process
📿 Enjoy your spiritual experience.

Key Features of the Quran


This application is created to meet the basic needs of any user. Its main characteristics guarantee that the system's high performance will make your feelings positive.
📿 Eye-catching interface
📿 Different types of instruments that ensure easy reading and memorizing of the sacred text
📿 Language selection. You can read in English everything you need to make your prayers comfortable!
📿 Unsophisticated registration procedure
📿 Simple and comprehensive navigation
📿 Excellent visual design elements and meaningful graphics
📿 High speed loading
📿 Excellent functionality
📿 High-level protection

📓 The Quran for Reading and Listening is essential to every Muslim who honors his religion and ideology. It is Islam's sacred scripture written in Arabic to show the key doctrinal tenets of Islam. The Quran text represents one of the original Arabic literary works that survived. Its unique content highlights the holy theme of Allah's divine unity of being and His transcendence. Discover the Word of Allah revealed to the Prophet Muhammad using this application daily! Maintain your spiritual heritage with this app!
🕋🕋🕋 Meet the Quran app to pray daily in comfort!

creator: App_Evolution
descriptionHtml:
Get accurate Prayer Times on Ramadan with our Islamic prayer app, which includes Fajr, Zuhr, Asr, Maghrib, and Isha prayers. Experience the beautiful sound of Athan and locate the direction of the Kaaba with our Qibla Finder. Use the digital tasbih and read the Al Quran Majeed. Don't forget to keep up with the Islamic calendar.

🕌 Features of the Prayer App:

- Prayer Reminders: Receive regular reminders for daily prayers and feel the closeness of Allah during Namaz time.
- Athan Alarm: Before each prayer, listen to a melodious Athan to remind you to perform the obligatory prayer. Choose from a selection of beautiful Azan sounds.
- Qibla Compass: Use our Qibla Finder to locate the direction of the Kaaba in Mecca from anywhere in the world.
- Quran: Read or listen to the Holy Quran translated into your language.
- Mosque Locator: Find nearby mosques when traveling to unfamiliar areas.
- Five Pillars of Islam: Learn and share knowledge about the foundation of Islam.
- Islamic Calendar: Keep track of Muslim holidays and prepare for the holy month of Ramadan.
- 99 Beautiful Names of Allah: Discover the beautiful names of Allah and deepen your spiritual connection.

🕌 Advantages:

- Convenient for children and adults
- Large selection of melodic Azans
- Easy access to the Holy Quran and 40 Hadiths
- Date Converter

🕌 How to Use:

1. Open the Muslim assistant.
2. Choose the required section from the menu.
3. Arrange alerts to receive reminders of Namaz.

The Muslim Prayer app will help you follow your faith and stay connected to your religion. Always stay on top of your Namaz and Muslim holidays. May Allah bless us all!🙌
descriptionShort: Daily Namaz during Ramadan - Azan, Quran Majeed, Qibla finder, Islamic calendar
